Meaning: Unique DAM_ID for each dam that links reservoir_attributes.csv to time_series_inventory.csv as well as the individual time series files in the time_series folder. In most cases it is equal to the GRAND_ID from the Global Reservoirs and Dams Dataset produced by Lehner et al, 2011.
Name of the dam that corresponds to the GRAND_ID from Lehner et al. 2011.
State where the dam is located.
The longitude of the dam's location.
The latitude of the dam's location.
The initial starting date of the time series data for this dam.
The final date of the time series data for this dam.
